response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth over $1,200,000 to me, and I believe it could be equally valuable to you. Considering its exceptional qualities and potential impact, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. I trust that you will find its benefits and features compelling enough to justify this investment. If you're interested in learning more about the product or proceeding with the purchase, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
